revised_title: Controversy Over Scarbrough Spaw and New England's Natural Remedies
tldr: The article discusses the controversy surrounding the Scarbrough Spaw and its potential ingredients, as well as the natural remedies used by Native Americans in New England for various ailments. It also examines the examination of medical waters and their impact on physiology and human health. The author calls for further impartial examination of these waters and their effects.
